posts.post_content:
I am liquidating my pre-war collection and going back to my first love....50's-60's Topps cards. If you would like more pics or a scan let me know and I can scan a card in the office tomorrow as our scanner/printer in on the blink.
Prices are pretty set as I am essentially trying to get out what I have in them, but I will negotiate some and especially if you buy more than one cards. Check/MO/Paypal gift accepted. please add $3 for shipping if under 100sale. 
Thanks!

T205's

Tinker with Hassan back  $115  (was PSA 3 before I removed it, have sticker)
Mathewson    SOLD
Wheat   Piedmont back   $80   (very small paper loss top right of back)
Bender  SOLD
Chance   SOLD
Speaker  piedmont back  SOLD
Pelty   piedmont back     $25
Mattern   piedmont back $20  (staining on back)


T206's

Tannehill   piedmont back  $35
Griffith    polar bear back   $60   (slight paper loss top right)
Chase    Sweet C back      $70
McGraw  piedmont back     SOLD

Any offers on the remaining cards? 
Thanks!
